title: Little Red Riding Hood
short_plot_summary: Little Red Riding Hood goes through the forest to deliver food to her grandmother and encounters a cunning wolf.
explanation: A girl, representing Little Red Riding Hood, the main character
A speech bubble, symbolizing the conversations between Little Red Riding Hood and the characters she meets
A wolf, depicting the antagonist in the story, trying to trick Little Red Riding Hood
An elderly woman, illustrating Little Red Riding Hood's grandmother, who the wolf impersonates
A tree, representing the forest setting in which the story takes place
